1.title: Singer/Song-Writer: Jeremy Tolleson

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

1.plot: Singer/Song-Writer: Jeremy Tolleson, discusses his methods for writing music and performs live on the air.

2.title: Author/Actor: Keith E. Johnson

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

2.plot: Author/Actor/Paranormal Investigator/Talk Show Host: Keith E. Johnson, discusses his many interests and accomplishments.

3.title: Cinematographer: Gabriela DeMedeiros

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

3.plot: Cinematographer: Gabriela DeMedeiros, described her behind the scenes filming techniques as the camera person for my short-films.

4.title: Entrepreneurs: Herbie Hicks & Joseph Greenhalgh

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

4.plot: Entrepreneurs: Herbie Hicks and Joseph Greenhalgh, explain their experience/background in roll playing and the creation of their game that they developed.

5.title: Song-Writer/Singer/Actor: James E. Herring, Sr.

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

5.plot: Singer/Song-Writer/Producer/Actor: James E. Herring, Sr., performed one of his songs on the show and discussed his experiences as an entertainer both on stage and behind the scenes, in music and for film.

6.title: Talk Show Host/Comedian: Derek Shapiro

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

6.plot: Talk Show Host/Actor: Derek Shapiro, expands on his last decade as a talk show host and his interest to develop stories that he now turns into films. He is also a stand-up comedian who writes his own material.

7.title: Teacher/Author: Susan B. Kahn

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

7.plot: Special Education Teacher/Author: Susan B. Kahn, describes her program for assisting students at all levels to overcome their learning disabilities, through her detailed strategies and helpful methods for teaching.

8.title: Coin Expert: Dylan McConaghy

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

8.plot: Coin and Diamond Expert: Dylan McConaghy, "breaks it down in detail" by pointing out rare and valuable coins that pass through our hands each day. He also gives an informative class on diamond quality.

9.title: Halloween Show w/Gemmie the Puppet

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

9.plot: Creepy Puppet: Gemmie, thankfully did not speak on the air - but nonetheless, was my guest for the 2016 Halloween Show, where I tell tales of truth, about scary things that have actually happened to me.

10.title: Drummer/Actor: Tim Plouffe

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

10.plot: Drummer/Actor: Tim Plouffe, tells us about his time as an on stage performer, both in theatre and as a member of a band. He shared a music video with us during the show, to illustrate one of his many skills.

11.title: Keith E. Johnson

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

11.plot: Author/Actor/Talk Show Host/Paranormal Investigator: Keith E. Johnson, "2nd Interview" to discuss his upcoming play, and to further elaborate on his many interesting experiences and interests.

12.title: Valentines Day Show

episode of.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (TV Series 2016–2017)

12.plot: FINAL EPISODE: The host of the show, Jason J. Tavares, reads two short stories for "Valentines Day" and says his thanks and goodbyes to the studio, as well as to all of his great guests/viewers that made the show an enjoyable one.

imdb.title: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers
akas: The Jason J. Tavares Show For Right-Brained Entertainers (United States)
plot: "The Jason J. Tavares Show for Right-Brained Entertainers" was a Rhode Island based television talk show, that allowed creative people a chance to be interviewed on the air in order to discuss their passion for anything creative.::Jason J. Tavares
